title: Donald Glover Scores Epic Role in Disney’s The Lion King Remake
text:
Donald Glover Scores Epic Role in Disney’s The Lion King Remake Donald Glover just keeps on winning. by VH1 4h   
Things keep getting better and better for Atlanta star and creator Donald Glover . Fresh off of two big wins at the Golden Globe awards and landing a role in an upcoming Star Wars installment, Glover has now nabbed a leading role in the recreation of Disney’s 1994 classic The Lion King . 
Disney director Jon Favreau used a famous song lyric from the movie to announce Glover’s role as Simba. I just can’t wait to be king. #Simba pic.twitter.com/wUYKixMBJI 
— Jon Favreau (@Jon_Favreau) February 18, 2017 
Acclaimed actor James Earl Jones , whose voice was used in the original film and two followup sequels, will reprise his role as Mufasa in the upcoming movie. Looking forward to working with this legend. #Mufasa pic.twitter.com/1LszbWrcYT 
— Jon Favreau (@Jon_Favreau) February 18, 2017 
The Lion King now joins the likes of Beauty and the Beast , Cinderella and The Jungle Book as classic Disney films that have been rebooted. 
An official release date for the remake has yet to be announced.
